mapper.select:
SELECT wsc.solicit_contribution_code AS solicitContributionCode, wsc.solicit_contribution_name AS solicitContributionName, wsc.solicit_contribution_pic_name AS solicitContributionPicName, wsc.solicit_contribution_pic_url AS solicitContributionPicUrl, wsc.solicit_contribution_status AS solicitContributionStatus, wsc.vote_count AS voteCount, wsc.remark AS remark, wsc.create_time AS createTime FROM wx_solicit_contribution wsc
wsc.solicit_contribution_status != 0
AND ( wsc.solicit_contribution_code = #{searchInput} OR wsc.solicit_contribution_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchInput}, '%') )
AND wsc.solicit_contribution_status = #{status}

SELECT wsc.solicit_contribution_code AS solicitContributionCode, wsc.solicit_contribution_name AS solicitContributionName, wsc.solicit_contribution_content AS solicitContributionContent, wsc.solicit_contribution_pic_name AS solicitContributionPicName, wsc.solicit_contribution_pic_url AS solicitContributionPicUrl, wsc.solicit_contribution_status AS solicitContributionStatus, wsc.vote_count AS voteCount, wsc.remark AS remark, wsc.create_time AS createTime FROM wx_solicit_contribution wsc
wsc.solicit_contribution_code = #{solicitContributionCode}
